nodes.text: This battle droid was stationed on the planet of Kiros and participated in the Battle of Kiros around 21 BBY.

During the Battle of Kiros, this B1-Series battle droid, along with two others and a group of B2 super battle droids was guarding a thermal annihilator bomb, under command of Separatist Zygerrian Darts D'Nar. The droid was destroyed along with all the others when Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker and Padawan Ahsoka Tano attacked them on AT-RTs and deactivated the bomb.
The battle droid was voiced by Matthew Wood, the actor who voices all the battle droids in the The Clone Wars TV series.
